Class OneHashPerFileTarget

java.lang.Object
  net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.execution.target.OneHashPerFileTarget
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExecutionTarget
public class OneHashPerFileTarget
extends Object
implements ExecutionTarget

An ExecutionTarget that writes digests to separate files.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Julien Nicoulaud

          throws ExecutionTargetInitializationException

public void write(String digest,
                  File file,

           throws ExecutionTargetWriteException
Write the hashcode calculated for the given file and algorithm to the target.

Specified by:
write in interface ExecutionTarget
Parameters:
digest - the digest to write.
file - the file for which the digest was calculated.
